extendedInfo.description: Famous quotes is a free application that contains a database of nearly 2000 of the best quotes by famous people. The application features the following:- An easy to use interface (use the buttons on the bottom of the screen to browse through the quotes)- Possibility to view random quotes or move back and forth between them- A number of different colored backgrounds to chose from- Possibility to mark your favorite quotes and browse through them- Possibility to send any quote by email, SMS, or any other service available on your mobile phone- Works both in portrait and landscape modeThe application includes quotes by famous people such as actors, authors, poets, scientists, politicians and much more.

reviews.comment: Great app, except that it needs GPS without possibility to disable it, and worse keeps GPS active when in background
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Another app ,,were arrow is next to adds,,,,hoping u accidently press the adds ,sadly ,,,,uninstalled,,!
